channel.title: Example JNI DLL
channel.description:
I created a classic hello world example with JNI and made a library, it has the visual studio project and some batch scripts since i was to lazy to manually do everything, lol. You might find it interesting!
http://www.mooload.com/new/file.php?file=/data/010607/1180666218/JNI+Example.rar
Some of the uses include
1.) People can't just *decompile* a dll, which means the source is safe :-) 2.) Fast execution time ( except loading the library ) 3.) Allows you to use native code 4.) You reap the benefits of how a DLL works.
Disadvantages
1.) Only usable on Windows 2.) Some other shit i don't want to explain

item.title: Example JNI DLL
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

yargh if i wasnt so ignorant to try another language i would say great job :p, but i couldnt get it to work makes me feel like a nub but i get this error

C:\Documents and Settings\Silab\Desktop\JNI DLL\JNI DLL>java HelloWorld Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: C:\Documents and Sett ings\Silab\Desktop\JNI DLL\JNI DLL\HelloWorld.dll: This application has failed t o start because the application configuration is incorrect. Reinstalling the app lication may fix this problem at java.lang.ClassLoader$NativeLibrary.load(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Unknown Source) at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(Unknown Source) at HelloWorld.(HelloWorld.java:4)

C:\Documents and Settings\Silab\Desktop\JNI DLL\JNI DLL>pause
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

I created a classic hello world example with JNI and made a library, it has the visual studio project and some batch scripts since i was to lazy to manually do everything, lol. You might find it interesting!

Some of the uses include

2.) Fast execution time ( except loading the library )
